task_choose_weapon1.questionText: Which of the following is a basic element of Prolog?

task_choose_weapon2.questionText: Can X be used in the rules `destroy(X) :- work(X, virus).`?
task_choose_weapon2.hint: Remember what the variable X represents.

task_choose_weapon3.questionText:
Given the following facts: `character(professor).`
 `character(steve).` 
 `character(metnik).`. What will the query `character(steve).` return?
task_choose_weapon3.hint: Think about what a fact is.

task_choose_weapon4.questionText: How can you find the length of the list `[a, b, c, d]` in Prolog?

task_choose_weapon5.questionText: Write a query that combines two lists into a third `Result = [1, 2, 3, 4]`.
task_choose_weapon5.hint: Recall the built-in constructions. Use the standard predicate append/3.

inception1_start.speaker: steve
inception1_start.dialogue: The first task was completed successfully! I didn't expect it to happen so quickly!

inception1_02.dialogue: I must admit, you are very smart and clever! I'm really happy for you!
inception1_02.speaker: robot

inception1_03.dialogue: I received a call from the director. Listening, sir!
inception1_03.speaker: steve

inception1_04.dialogue: Special agent Steve Harrison, this is FBI Director Edgar Hoover. I have urgent news for you!
inception1_04.speaker: director

inception1_05.dialogue: We managed to track Kevin Mitnick's location. He's somewhere in the house. Be careful! He may have a weapon!

inception1_06.dialogue: Understood. Any new information on Sara Parker?
inception1_06.speaker: steve

inception1_07.dialogue: We have interviewed all the people involved in the case, but unfortunately, this didnâ€™t provide us with any new information. No one saw or heard anything. It's as if she vanished into thin air.

inception1_08.dialogue: I have a feeling that Mitnick is keeping her somewhere nearby...
inception1_08.speaker: steve

inception1_09.dialogue: You will also need to work on this version. Good luck! You have an important mission ahead of you!
inception1_09.speaker: director

inception1_10.dialogue: It's so dark and gloomy here! But we can't delay. If Mitnick is somewhere in the house, then Sara Parker must be nearby as well. Let's go upstairs!
inception1_10.speaker: steve

inception1_11.dialogue: Be careful going up, sir! Some of the steps are rigged with traps. This is your next task...
inception1_11.speaker: robot

inception2_start.speaker: steve
inception2_start.dialogue: Another trap! The door is locked again... We need to enter a code here as well.

inception2_01.dialogue: You've already completed two tasks! Don't lose hope, sir!
inception2_01.speaker: robot

inception2_02.dialogue: I think I hear some noises under this door! It feels like someone is there! I'll grab my gun...
inception2_02.speaker: steve

inception2_04.dialogue: I'm scared too! But the scariest thing is not being able to complete all the tasks in 6 hours! If that happens, the whole world will end!
inception2_04.speaker: steve

inception2_05.dialogue: Yes, let's move on to the next task!
inception2_05.speaker: robot

inception3_start.speaker: steve
inception3_start.dialogue: Well, who would have thought that such a cozy office could be found in this house.

inception3_01.dialogue: I have the feeling that someone has been here recently, even left some papers on the desk.

inception3_02.dialogue: It's a very nice and cozy room.
inception3_02.speaker: robot

inception3_03.dialogue: But there's no computer here, so we will have to keep looking. Mitnick was probably here very recently.
inception3_03.speaker: steve

inception3_07.dialogue: Could it be Mitnick decided to return to his office?
inception3_07.speaker: steve

inception3_08.dialogue: I'll hide under the table so no one notices me. Ouch, ouch, ouch... there's another hidden trap here.
inception3_08.speaker: steve

inception3_09.dialogue: I accidentally triggered some mechanism and got caught. Metal bars have dropped around me...
inception3_09.speaker: steve

inception3_11.dialogue: You need to complete another task and enter a code. Only then will you be able to free yourself.
inception3_11.speaker: robot

inception3_12.dialogue: I agree, the bars are too strong... There's little time left! Plus, anyone can come in here! We need to complete the task quickly and head to search for the computer.
inception3_12.speaker: steve

inception4_start.speaker: steve
inception4_start.dialogue: Phew! It worked! I got out of the trap. Now we need to quickly head off to search for the computer!

inception4_04.dialogue: Let's go check it out! It seems like there is indeed someone there!

inception4_08.dialogue: Help me get free, please! I know where the main computer is! We need to hurry, thereâ€™s not much time left!
